justification: No evidence of Team B’s beliefs: they value rookies and upside, yet the rationale ignores this and offers an injured Tier-5 TE as a sweetener. It mislabels Josh Garcia as an RB upgrade over James Holt (Tier 1), and calls Kyle Martinez “steadier” despite variance. Team A’s conservative profile conflicts with adding a rookie deep threat. While B might like upgrading to Holt, sacrificing a rookie RB and WR they value isn’t addressed. Thin, incorrect reasoning and poor ToM.
